fields.name: pending
fields.description: Number of bytes pending in transmitter buffer for each target

fields.name: usage
fields.description: Maximum usage transmitter buffer during the last sysmon period for each target

fields.name: peakUsage
fields.description: Maximum usage transmitter buffer for each target

fields.name: tUsage
fields.description: Maximum usage of transmitter buffer during the last sysmon period for all targets

fields.name: tPeakusage
fields.description: Maximum usage of transmitter buffer for all targets
